snippet: Emmylou Harris and Rodney Crowell played at Americanafest NYC, a collaboration between Lincoln Center Out of Doors and the American Music Association, which runs through Sunday.
abstract: Nate Chinen describes highlights from Americanafest NYC, collaboration between Lincoln Center Out of Doors and American Music Association; notes that event is bound more by loose aesthetic and sound rather than by any particular genre.
lead_paragraph: Emmylou Harris and Rodney Crowell played at Americanafest NYC, a collaboration between Lincoln Center Out of Doors and the American Music Association, which runs through Sunday.

headline.main: An Eclectic Mix of Hard-Luck Tales
